page.title: 11CHANGING TIMES
page.content: In the last twenty years there has been a gradual change in the character of the Kempsey area,from basically a rural village to that of an urban area,with the city of Worcester growing ever nearer.Between 1960 and 1970,three new housing estates were completed.Afourth estate "Plovers Rise"was only completed in 1984. The increase in the housing has coincided with an increase in the population,as Kempsey has become something of a dormitory village for the area as a whole.In 1961 the population was some 1,704 rising to it's present total of over 3,000.As part of this development,street lighting was added in 1971. The inhabitants of Kempsey use the local shops for convenience goods,the daily necessities whilst using the close proximity of the motorway...
